thread.title: Former Dewey & LeBoeuf Executives’ Lawyers Give Final Arguments at Fraud Trial
thread.title_full: Former Dewey & LeBoeuf Executives’ Lawyers Give Final Arguments at Fraud Trial - WSJ

author: Sara Randazzo
title: Former Dewey & LeBoeuf Executives’ Lawyers Give Final Arguments at Fraud Trial
text:
Defense lawyers for former Dewey & LeBoeuf LLP executives made their final pitches this week to convince jurors that their clients played no role in an alleged scheme to falsely inflate the now-defunct law firm’s revenue and don’t belong in prison.
The financial fraud charges Dewey’s former leaders face had nothing to do with why the once-storied law firm collapsed into bankruptcy in May 2012, defense lawyers told jurors. Instead,... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
